title: This is so frustrating (MAC)
body: I've recently deleted my league app, and i downloaded the most recent install package from the site. after ive dome everything to run  the app, it patches for hours, downloading bulks of ~4000 MB of data, yet it never finishes, sometimes it get stuck at 33% the highest was 77%. when i close the app and open it again, it starts over at 33% downloading even more files. right now its over 20GB in total. i cant seem to find a way to fix this. PLEASE HELP ME THIS IS DRIVING ME CRAZY!!! thanks!

replies.body:
Any patching issues after the 33% mark are typically caused by a *poor connection* to the patching servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac). 

Let me know if this helped!
